entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening and ending late this evening. Clearing late this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
